item.title: Pimpscape server help~reward~
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

Search for

sendMessage("Welcome to the  pimpscape Server!")

and you should see something like

if(playerRights < 1) { sendMessage("Welcome to the pimpscape Server!"); sendMessage("You can pk ANYWHERE!"); sendMessage("Rewards for getting pk points are given too, more to be added :)"); sendMessage("Tele to watchtower fr a (LATE) easter surprise! :D"); sendMessage("If you crash and cant connect, restart your client"); sendMessage("Type ::rules for this server's rules."); } if(playerRights == 1) { sendMessage("Welcome back moderator "+playerName); sendMessage("Welcome to the official pimpscape Server!"); sendMessage("You can pk ANYWHERE!"); sendMessage("Rewards for getting pk points are given too, more to be added :)"); sendMessage("If you crash and cant connect, restart your client"); sendMessage("Type ::rules for this server's rules."); } if(playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Welcome back administrator "+playerName); sendMessage("Welcome to the official pimpscape Server!"); sendMessage("You can pk ANYWHERE!"); sendMessage("Rewards for getting pk points are given too, more to be added :)"); sendMessage("If you crash and cant connect, restart your client"); sendMessage("Type ::rules for this server's rules.");
(it’s a little different than what you should see, because I editted mine also)

Whatever you want to edit, go ahead and edit it, then save, compile and run. It should work.

Read full topic
